about: In addition to my Software Engineer role at SDC, I am also a passionate game and app developer, with a portfolio of mobile games and applications that I have created and published under my own brand, BllockGames. I have been in the programming area since 2018, and I have acquired multiple certifications in React.js, Angular, and problem solving from HackerRank. I am currently pursuing my degree in Informatics and Applied Mathematics at Yerevan State University, where I learn and apply the theoretical and practical aspects of computer science and mathematics. My goal is to continue developing innovative and engaging products and solutions that leverage my skills and interests in programming, web/app development, and game development.

projects.description: The Pyramid Mystery is an adventure/puzzle android game made with Unity. It consists of 2 chapters. I used modern technologies such as AI and game storytelling to create the game. Enjoy playing :)

THIS WEBSITE IS UDEMY COURSE PROJECT. It is about football team Manchester City and created with React.js. Uses Firebase DB and hosting. It also has admin dashboard with login system (Firebase auth). In the website is shown the information about the team, matches and players with a lot of animations.
THIS WEBSITE IS UDEMY COURSE PROJECT. It is about a musical event. The website is created with React.js.
This is an online shop prototype created with Laravel. It has admin dashboard, login/registration system and account page with card. It is not deployed anywhere.

NOT FINISHED. This is a startups platform where you can view startups or register your own. It is created with React.js, has login/registration system, account page and a lot of animations. There is much more so just watch.
Mazer is an arcade android game made with Unity. It has online leaderboard working on Firebase. Try to pass the levels collecting gems and buying/upgrading characters.
